Any three (3) Subjects  DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) CALABAR accepts three (3)-year programme for 
candidates with NCE in Special Education/Physical and 
Health Education.  
(ii) IBADAN insists on teaching subjects offered at 
University of Ibadan.
